title: New: Throwing Snow – Behest
body: It had been a little while since we had heard from [Throwing Snow](http://soundcloud.com/throwingsnow) prior to him dropping his rather superb new track _Aspera_, just under a month ago. Now we have the second cut from his imminent new EP (Dec 3rd). Just under 5 minutes of masterfully executed and epically developed house music, in the loosest sense of the word. It’s grand in scope, weighty in its themes and frankly his EP’s release can’t come soon enough.
